title: Arvelos
body: The first people known to have used this surname in Madeira are Diogo de Arvelos, who settled in Machico around 1490, and Pedro Gonçalves de Arvelos, who was serving as a judge in Santa Cruz around 1569, both being noble individuals.

Machico: Location where Diogo de Arvelos settled
Santa Cruz: Location where Pedro Gonçalves de Arvelos served as a judge

Pedro Gonçalves de Arvelos: Served as a judge in Santa Cruz

1490: Diogo de Arvelos settled in Machico
1569: Pedro Gonçalves de Arvelos served as a judge in Santa Cruz
